definition: to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things

sentences.english: Read 20 reviews Virgin Mobile PAYG, so a good deal.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀20維珍移動評語現收現付，使一個很好的協議。

sentences.english: I attach a copy of my Hong Kong Identity Card.
sentences.chinese: 現付上本人香港身分證副本一份。

sentences.english: As a rule, teenagers have phones on pay as you go.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一項規定，青少年買手機都是現買現付。

sentences.english: You can have it for only $65 down.
sentences.chinese: 你只要現付65美元就可以買了。

sentences.english: In order to express our sorry, here is a coupon for use at our hotel restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 現付本酒店飲食贈卷一張以作我們對你的歉意。
